name: Monster Yum Yum
description:
Defend your fleshy monster body from hordes of puny humans who want nothing more than to crack you skull. Show your strength and fling all humans to their death.

*it's highly recommended to download a build for the best experience

Controls:
- Click and drag on your body/humans and fling them off
- Don't let them reach the top

Made by:
Chris Wade and Mariah Hale in 15 hours. Follow us on twitter if you want to chat about the game or how we made it.
@cjacobwade
@spitefulcrow

Music is Mozart's Magic Flute
